name: Heart's Ambition
description:
Heart's Ambition is a game where holding the space bar, or not holding the space bar are the only two actions you have. However, this short game is challenging, and can take many tries to overcome it.

You control a floating, masked figure who wields dark and light magic. Below you, the one you gave your heart to rests in a crystal cocoon. Ominous forces wish to destroy your love, and you must protect her. Cast the right spell to destroy them, or face the end of your heart.

Controls:

-Hold the Space button - Cast a dark fireball at the nearest foe.

-Don't hold Space - Cast a light fireball at the nearest foe.

Enemies come in light and dark varieties, and can only be destroyed by a fireball of the opposite alignment. Survive all three rounds before the crystal can be broken. If you can...

Submitted for the OneButtonJam 2016.
